verses.roman:
āra dravya rahu--śuna nārikelera kathā
pāṅca gaṇḍā kari' nārikela vikāya tathā

synonyms: āra dravya rahu—apart from the other commodities; śuna—just hear; nārikelera kathā—the incident of offering coconuts; pāṅca gaṇḍā kari'-at the price of five gaṇḍās; nārikela—coconut; vikāya—is sold; tathā—there.
translation: "Apart from other commodities, just hear about his coconut offering. A coconut is sold at the rate of five gaṇḍās each.
